entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/featureinfo-service/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration -p TAG=2.0.29 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=200m -p CPU_LIMIT=400m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=125Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=250Mi -p ENVIRONMENT=integration | oc apply -n gdi-integration -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-integration featureinfo-service oc rollout status -n gdi-integration dc featureinfo-service
